hackathon-description-text: Beta Breakers Game Jam is an annual event in San Francisco. Come meet and work with some of the most creative and talented game developers in the Bay area.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Kabam Founder & Current VP of Vungle Product & Engineering

hackathon-eligibility:
Show up at Vungle's office in San Francisco at 6pm on Friday November 14th.
Registration will take place from 6:00-7:00. 
Coding will occur until 12:30 Saturday November 15th.
Participants will have the opportunity to check out others' submissions science-fair style, followed by several rounds of judging.
hackathon-requirements: Build any kind of game using any technologies ! The only limitation is that all submitted work must start and finish at Beta Breakers.
hackathon-rules:
Prizes will be awared by sponsors, based on their own judging criteria and methods.
Beta Breakers Game Jam reserves the right to eliminate participants for any reason. Hate speech, discrimination, violence, or the promotion of a hostile enviroment for other participants will not be tolerated.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The prizes will be announced on Friday during the sponsor pitch session.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=185 Clara Street, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Sponsors will select top submissions in accordance with their respective criteria. The incorporation of more sponsor tools may increase chances of winning !

hackathon-location-address: 185 Clara Street, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA
hackathon-description-header: Beta Breakers Game Jam is an annual 24-hour, 300 person event in San Francisco. Come meet and work with some of the most creative and talented game developers in the Bay area.
